resources.welcomePageSubtitle: Join Wish Lists for free and share in the fun!
resources.welcomePageBulletText1: Save, organize, and get feedback on products you're interested in.
resources.welcomePageBulletText2: Share your wish lists with family and friends and make shopping decisions together.
resources.welcomePageBulletText3: Use wish lists to discover and discuss gifts. Never buy the wrong gift again!
